original_text:
Extra Wild
Le pietre preziose ammaliano le persone ormai da millenni con le loro sfaccettature luminose e di colori magnetici. Ma non è solo il loro aspetto esteriore ad attrarre così tanto la gente, ma il loro significato di ricchezza.
Del resto se nel passato era facile pensare a vividi rubini incastonati sulle corone di re e regine, ora i diamanti si trovano su costosi orologi da uomini facoltosi o brillanti anelli da star mondiali.
Extra Wild della Merkur ci fa vivere un po’ di questo lusso e ricchezza con la sua slot a tema gemme preziose. Iniziamo dunque la nostra recensione partendo dalla sua parte più grafica.
Extra Wild – Grafica
La griglia di gioco di Extra Wild sembra adagiarsi sullo sfondo di un telo di velluto blu. La griglia punta alla semplicità, probabilmente per mettere in risalto i simboli della slot o anche perché la semplicità stessa è diventata un po’ il marchio di fabbrica delle slot targate Merkur.
Extra Wild vuole risaltare su tante altre slot, eliminando la presenza dei classici simboli delle carte da gioco per sostituirli con simboli del tutto originali e che rimandano al tema della ricchezza e delle pietre preziose.
Troveremo infatti sacchetti colmi di monete, monete d’oro, orologi da taschino ma anche lucenti diamanti, rubini, zaffiri e il medaglione d’oro a forma di cuore. Le illustrazioni di questi simboli sono altrettanto semplici e molto grafiche, che sacrificano i dettagli per essere riconoscibili a colpo d’occhio dai giocatori.
La semplicità, spesso, può essere un’arma a doppio taglio. Non è facile rappresentare qualcosa in modo essenziale senza sembrare spoglio, ma in questo caso la Merkur sebbene non eccella dal punto di vista artistico rispetto ad altre slot, riesce comunque nel suo intento.
Passiamo al prossimo punto della recensione per parlare, invece, della sua parte più tecnica.
Extra Wild – il comparto tecnico
Passiamo al settore tecnico di questa slot: sulla carta ci troviamo di fronte a una slot di stampo decisamente classico. I cinque rulli e le tre linee lungo le quali si dispongono i simboli delle varie giocate creano una griglia di tipo 5*3 molto comune tra i titoli online.
Le linee di vincita sono 10, non tantissime ma sufficienti per avere un numero discreto di vincite (solitamente si assisterà a diversi turni senza vincite per poi ottenere più combinazioni nello stesso turno).
Una delle funzioni di maggior interesse, come suggerisce lo stesso titolo della slot, è il simbolo Wild: rappresentato dalla porta di una cassaforte o più propriamente da un vault, il simbolo nasconderà alla sue spalle un moltiplicatore sulle vincite che permetterà di ottenere combinazioni di maggior valore.
In quanto Wild, infatti, esso potrà sostituire qualsiasi altro simbolo in gioco e svolgere la funzione di jolly. Oltre a questa non ci sono tante altre funzioni speciali, dando a questa slot un gameplay piuttosto lineare ma non noioso.
Slot simili ad Extra Wild
Il tema dei gioielli è molto popolare fra le slot online e quindi è facile trovare moltissimi titoli su di essi. Fra i tanti segnaliamo slot come: Jewel Box, Diamonds, Jewels World, Gems & Stones e la conturbante 7 Sins.

raw_translation.response:
Extra Wild

For millennia, people have been captivated by the brilliant facets and magnetic colors of precious stones. It's not just their external appearance that draws people, it's their meaning of wealth. In the past, vivid rubies were think of as being set in crowns worn by kings and queens. Nowadays, diamonds can be found on expensive watches worn by wealthy men or shining rings worn by Hollywood stars. 

Extra Wild by Merkur allows us to experience a bit of this luxury and wealth with its gem-themed slot. Let's start our review by looking at its graphical part.

Extra Wild - Graphics

The game board of Extra Wild seems to be placed on a background of blue velvet. The board design is simple, probably to highlight the slot symbols, or because simplicity has become a hallmark of Merkur slots. 

Extra Wild wants to stand out from other slots by eliminating the classic playing card symbols and replacing them with entirely original symbols that refer to the theme of wealth and precious stones. We find bags full of coins, gold coins, pocket watches, as well as sparkling diamonds, rubies, sapphires, and a gold heart-shaped locket. The illustrations of these symbols are just as simple and graphic, sacrificing details to be easily recognizable to players at a glance.

Simplicity can often be a double-edged sword. It's not easy to represent something in an essential way without appearing minimalist, but in this case, Merkur, although not excelling from an artistic point of view, still succeeds in its intent.

Let's move on to the next point of the review to talk, instead, about its technical part.

Extra Wild - Technical Features

Let's focus on the technical sector of this slot: on paper, we find ourselves faced with a decidedly classic-style slot. The five reels and three lines on which the symbols of the various bets are arranged create a grid of the 5 * 3 type that is very common among online titles. 

There are 10 winning lines, not a lot, but enough to have a decent number of winnings (usually, there will be several turns without winnings followed by more combinations in the same round). 

One of the most interesting functions, as suggested by the slot's name, is the Wild symbol. Represented by the door of a safe or, more precisely, by a vault, the symbol will hide a multiplier on the winnings behind it, allowing for combinations of greater value. 

As a Wild, it can replace any other symbol in the game and act as a joker. Apart from this, there aren't many other special functions, giving this slot a rather linear gameplay but not a boring one.

Slots Similar to Extra Wild

The theme of jewelry is very popular among online slots, so it's easy to find many titles on them. Among the many, we suggest slots such as Jewel Box, Diamonds, Jewels World, Gems & Stones, and the tantalizing 7 Sins.

response.headline: Game Theme and Design
response.content: The theme of Extra Wild revolves around precious gemstones and wealth, featuring symbols such as gold coins, diamond, rubies, and more. The design is simple, with the game grid set against a blue velvet backdrop, and original graphics for each symbol.

response.headline: Overview of Game Features
response.content: The game features 5 reels and 10 paylines, with the Wild symbol represented by the door of a safe and functioning as a multiplier for wins. The slot game has a linear gameplay, but not boring.

response.headline: Explanation of Wild Symbol and its Function as a Multiplier
response.content: The Wild symbol in Extra Wild is represented by a vault and can replace any other symbol in the game, acting as a wild card. Furthermore, the Wild symbol hides a multiplier for wins, allowing players to obtain combinations of greater value.

response.headline: Evaluation of Gameplay and Entertainment Value
response.content: Extra Wild offers a simple and straightforward gameplay, but it still manages to communicate the theme of wealth and luxury effectively. The lack of many special features can make the game feel repetitive, but the potential for big wins with the Wild symbol multiplier can keep players engaged.

response.headline: Comparison to Similar Slot Games in the Market
response.content: Jewel-themed slot games are popular in the online casino market, and Extra Wild is a good addition to the collection, particularly for players looking for a straightforward gameplay and big wins. Other similar games include Jewel Box, Diamonds, Jewels World, Gems & Stones, and 7 Sins.

review_with_topics.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
review_with_topics.prompt:
Below is a review for the slot game "Extra Wild".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Description of game theme and design
Overview of game features (reels, paylines, Wild symbol)
Explanation of Wild symbol and its function as a multiplier
Evaluation of gameplay and entertainment value
Comparison to similar slot games in the market

- The review must be very detailed
- No FAQ
- No Notes
- Respond with a JSON array, one item per topic (use the keys "headline" and "content")

The game grid of Extra Wild seems to lie on a background of blue velvet. The grid aims for simplicity, probably to highlight the slot's symbols or even because simplicity itself has become a trademark of Merkur's slot games.
Extra Wild wants to stand out from many other slots, eliminating the classic playing card symbols and replacing them with entirely original symbols that refer to the theme of wealth and precious gemstones.
We will indeed find bags full of coins, gold coins, pocket watches, shiny diamonds, rubies, sapphires, and the heart-shaped gold medallion. The illustrations of these symbols are just as simple and graphic, sacrificing detail to be recognizable at a glance by players.
Simplicity can often be a double-edged sword. It's not easy to represent something in an essential way without appearing bare, but in this case, even though Merkur doesn't excel artistically compared to other slots, it still succeeds in its intent.
Let's move on to the next point of the review to talk about its more technical aspect.
Extra Wild - Technical Features
Let's move on to the technical sector of this slot game: on paper, we are faced with a decidedly classic slot game. The five reels and three lines along which the symbols of the various games are arranged create a grid of the 5*3 type that is very common among online titles.
There are 10 paylines, not very many but sufficient to have a decent number of wins (usually, you will see several rounds without any wins and then get more combinations in the same round).
One of the most interesting functions, as suggested by the title of the slot game, is the Wild symbol: represented by the door of a safe or more precisely by a vault, the symbol will hide behind it a multiplier on the wins that will allow you to obtain combinations of greater value.
As a Wild symbol, in fact, it can replace any other symbol in the game and function as a wild card. There aren't many other special features, giving this slot game a rather linear but not boring gameplay.
Slot games similar to Extra Wild
The theme of jewels is very popular among online slot games, and therefore it's easy to find many titles on them. Among the many, we recommend slot games like Jewel Box, Diamonds, Jewels World, Gems & Stones, and the alluring 7 Sins.

response.headline: How Extra Wild Stacks Up Against Other Slot Games
response.content:
Looking for a new slot game to play but not sure where to start? Extra Wild is a fantastic option for anyone who loves a good treasure hunt with the extra thrill of high rewards. But how does it compare to other similar games in the market?

Well, if you're a fan of jewel-themed slot games, you'll be happy to know there are plenty of options out there for you! However, when it comes to straightforward gameplay and big wins, Extra Wild really stands out. Unlike some of its competitors, this game doesn't rely on complicated bonus rounds or intricate game mechanics - it's just pure, unadulterated fun from start to finish.

Of course, everyone has their personal preferences when it comes to slot games. Maybe you're looking for a more complex experience that requires a bit more strategy and skill (or maybe you just really enjoy unlocking all those hidden bonus rounds). If that's the case, games like Jewel Box or Jewels World might be right up your alley. Or perhaps you're searching for something with a little more edge? If that's the case, check out 7 Sins for a more risqué take on the classic jewel slot game.

But if you're just looking for a great all-around slot game that's easy to pick up and play anytime, Extra Wild is definitely the way to go. So what are you waiting for? Grab your pickaxe and get ready to unleash your inner treasure hunter with Extra Wild!

- SEO optimized meta title with a maximum length of 45 characters. Include the words "play" and "free". Capitalize according to AP rules.
- SEO optimized, neutral meta description, explaining the review with a maximum length of 20 words. Include the words "play" and "free".

Respond with a JSON using the keys "pros" (simple array), "cons" (simple array), "meta_title" and "meta_description". 

Review:
 
Gameplay

Extra Wild is a slot game that aims for simplicity in its gameplay, as it features a 5-reel, 3-row grid with 10 paylines. The game has a rather linear but not boring gameplay, and players can enjoy the Wild symbol's unique feature that hides behind it a multiplier on the wins that allows for greater value combinations.

Wild Symbol Feature

In Extra Wild, the Wild symbol is represented by the door of a safe or vault and functions as a wild card that can replace any other symbol in the game. The symbol's unique feature is its hidden multiplier, which can increase the value of the wins considerably.

Game Grid and Theme

The game grid of Extra Wild features a blue velvet background and aims for simplicity to highlight the slot's symbols. The symbols themselves are original and refer to the theme of wealth and precious gemstones, with bags of coins, gold coins, pocket watches, shiny diamonds, rubies, sapphires, and a heart-shaped gold medallion. The illustrations of these symbols are graphic and recognizable at a glance by players.

Paylines

Extra Wild features 10 paylines, which is not a lot compared to some other online slot games. However, it's sufficient to have a decent number of wins, with several rounds without any wins followed by more combinations in the same round.

Similar Games

The theme of jewels is popular among online slot games, and there are many titles on the theme. Similar games to Extra Wild include Jewel Box, Diamonds, Jewels World, Gems & Stones, and 7 Sins.

Below is a review of the game "Extra Wild".

Please provide an FAQ:

- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Extra Wild
For millennia, precious gemstones have enchanted people with their luminous facets and magnetic colors. But it's not just their outer appearance that attracts people so much, but their significance of wealth.
In the past, it was easy to think of vivid rubies set in the crowns of kings and queens. Now, diamonds can be found on expensive watches worn by wealthy men or brilliant rings worn by world stars.
Extra Wild from Merkur lets us experience a little bit of this luxury and wealth with its gem-themed slot game. Let's start our review by focusing on its visual aspect.
Extra Wild - Graphics
The game grid of Extra Wild seems to lie on a background of blue velvet. The grid aims for simplicity, probably to highlight the slot's symbols or even because simplicity itself has become a trademark of Merkur's slot games.
Extra Wild wants to stand out from many other slots, eliminating the classic playing card symbols and replacing them with entirely original symbols that refer to the theme of wealth and precious gemstones.
We will indeed find bags full of coins, gold coins, pocket watches, shiny diamonds, rubies, sapphires, and the heart-shaped gold medallion. The illustrations of these symbols are just as simple and graphic, sacrificing detail to be recognizable at a glance by players.
Simplicity can often be a double-edged sword. It's not easy to represent something in an essential way without appearing bare, but in this case, even though Merkur doesn't excel artistically compared to other slots, it still succeeds in its intent.
Let's move on to the next point of the review to talk about its more technical aspect.
Extra Wild - Technical Features
Let's move on to the technical sector of this slot game: on paper, we are faced with a decidedly classic slot game. The five reels and three lines along which the symbols of the various games are arranged create a grid of the 5*3 type that is very common among online titles.
There are 10 paylines, not very many but sufficient to have a decent number of wins (usually, you will see several rounds without any wins and then get more combinations in the same round).
One of the most interesting functions, as suggested by the title of the slot game, is the Wild symbol: represented by the door of a safe or more precisely by a vault, the symbol will hide behind it a multiplier on the wins that will allow you to obtain combinations of greater value.
As a Wild symbol, in fact, it can replace any other symbol in the game and function as a wild card. There aren't many other special features, giving this slot game a rather linear but not boring gameplay.
Slot games similar to Extra Wild
The theme of jewels is very popular among online slot games, and therefore it's easy to find many titles on them. Among the many, we recommend slot games like Jewel Box, Diamonds, Jewels World, Gems & Stones, and the alluring 7 Sins.

dalle-prompt.response: Prompt: Create a feature image for Extra Wild that follows the game's luxury and gemstone theme. The image should be in cartoon style and feature a happy Maya warrior with glasses. The warrior should be standing on a treasure chest overflowing with precious gems, gold coins, and diamond-encrusted watches. The warrior should be holding a large diamond in one hand and flashing a winning grin, indicating the success players can achieve in the game. The background should have a blue velvet texture, similar to that of the game grid, to tie in the game's visual aspect. Overall, the image should evoke feelings of luxury, wealth, and success, fitting for a game about precious gemstones.
